column1: #Text=You should have called the police and stayed out of the way .
#Text=" Korra says : " But I could n't just sit by and do nothing .
#Text=" Lin says : " Oh , I am well aware of who you are .
#Text=And your Avatar title might impress some people , but not me .
#Text=Then I want to talk to whoever 's in charge .
#Text=" Lin says : " You 're talking to her .
